title: Light, fast & responsive
text: Powered by ChatGPT, a well known AI tool, QuizHub has lightning fast response times times to help you be more efficient when studying.

section.title: Why QuizHub?
section.content: QuizHub is a simple tool to help you study for tests efficiently without having to take time searching for questions.

section.title: Why ChatGPT?
section.content: ChatGPT already helps students with school, so we know that it works well. QuizHub amplifies and filters ChatGPT to get rid of false answers and misc. responses
